titleStmt.title: The popish proselyte the grand fanatick. Or an antidote against the poyson of Captain Robert Everard's Epistle to the several congregations of the non-conformists
titleStmt.author: Harrison, Joseph.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Samuel Tidmarsh, at the Kings Head in Cornhill, next house to the Royal Exchange,

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Everard, Robert. An epistle to the several congregations of the non-conformists.
Reproduction of the original in the Dr. Williams' Library, London.

place.placeName: the Kings Head in Cornhill, next house to the Royal Exchange
